titles.title: Recognizing on May 28, 2018, Memorial Day, the denial of full voting rights in Congress for active duty servicemembers, National Guard members, reservists, veterans, and their families who are residents of the District of Columbia.

Recognizing on May 28, 2018, Memorial Day, the denial of full voting rights in Congress for active duty servicemembers, National Guard members, reservists, veterans, and their families who are residents of the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Recognizes, on Memorial Day, May 28, 2018, the denial of full voting rights in Congress for active duty service members, National Guard members, reservists, veterans, and their families who are residents of Washington, DC.
